Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,500,000 to you. We understand the significance of this product in your endeavors and are confident it will contribute greatly to your success. To make this acquisition more accessible, we are offering you the chance to secure this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this proposition carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
